SELECT i.* , d.sale_price_date AS stock_price_date, sph.history_price AS sale_price FROM (SELECT id AS product_tools_infor_id , product_name , product_code , product_sort_code , product_source , product_brand , brand_code, stock_price FROM t_product_tools_infor t WHERE t.parent_id = 'root'
t.product_name like '%$productName$%'
t.product_code like '%$productCode$%'
t.product_sort_code like '%$productSortCode$%'
t.brand_code like '%$brandCode$%'
t.product_brand like '%$productBrand$%'
t.product_source like '%$productSource$%'
order by $sort$ $dir$
LIMIT #start#,#limit#) i LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MAX(t.sale_price_date) AS sale_price_date, t.product_brand FROM t_sales_price_history t WHERE t.sale_price_date <= (SELECT CURDATE()) AND t.product_brand IS NOT NULL GROUP BY t.product_brand ORDER BY t.sale_price_date DESC ) d ON i.product_brand=d.product_brand LEFT JOIN t_sales_price_history sph ON i.product_tools_infor_id = sph.product_tool_infor_id AND sph.sale_price_date = d.sale_price_date

select t.id , t.product_tools_infor_id, t.suppliers_infor_id , tp.product_name , t.product_code , t.brand_code , t.history_price , tp.product_sort_code , tp.product_brand , tp.product_source, tp.sale_price, t.user_name , t.edit_date , t.leaf , t.parent_id , t.user_id , t.stock_price_date , ts.supplier_name from t_order_price_history t left join t_product_tools_infor tp on t.product_tools_infor_id = tp.id left join t_suppliers_infor ts on t.suppliers_infor_id = ts.id where t.product_tools_infor_id = #productToolsInforId#
t.suppliers_infor_id = #suppliersInforId#
order by stock_price_date desc
limit #start#,#limit#

select count(tp.id) from t_product_tools_infor tp where tp.parent_id = 'root'
tp.product_name like '%$productName$%'
tp.product_code like '%$productCode$%'
tp.product_sort_code like '%$productSortCode$%'
tp.brand_code like '%$brandCode$%'
tp.product_brand like '%$productBrand$%'
tp.product_source like '%$productSource$%'

select count(*) from t_order_price_history t where t.product_tools_infor_id = #product_tools_infor_id#
t.suppliers_infor_id = #suppliersInforId#
